channel.title: CVE Feed for Arista Networks -- Arista EOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arista Networks -- Arista EOS

item.title: CVE-2021-28496|2024-09-16T17:39:06.302Z -- arista%20networks -- arista%20eos
item.description: On systems running Arista EOS and CloudEOS with the affected release version, when using shared secret profiles the password configured for use by BiDirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) will be leaked when displaying output over eAPI or other JSON outputs to other authenticated users on the device. The affected EOS Versions are: all releases in 4.22.x train, 4.23.9 and below releases in the 4.23.x train, 4.24.7 and below releases in the 4.24.x train, 4.25.4 and below releases in the 4.25.x train, 4.26.1 and below releases in the 4.26.x train

item.title: CVE-2021-28500|2024-09-16T18:44:53.535Z -- arista%20networks -- arista%20eos
item.description: An issue has recently been discovered in Arista EOS where the incorrect use of EOS's AAA APIâ€™s by the OpenConfig and TerminAttr agents could result in unrestricted access to the device for local users with nopassword configuration.
